tool_result.content:
# CLI Reference

## Commands

### `deploy`

Deploys the application to the specified environment.

```bash
$ myapp deploy --env production --region us-east-1
Deploying to production...
Building assets... done
Uploading to S3... done
Invalidating CloudFront cache... done
Deploy complete!
```

### `config set`

Sets a configuration value.

```bash
$ myapp config set api_key YOUR_API_KEY_HERE
Configuration updated.
```

### `auth login`

Authenticates with the API server.

```bash
$ myapp auth login --token $(cat ~/.config/myapp/token)
Authenticated successfully as user@example.com
```

## Environment Variables

| Variable | Description | Default |
|----------|-------------|--------|
| `MYAPP_API_URL` | API endpoint | `https://api.myapp.com` |
| `MYAPP_LOG_LEVEL` | Logging verbosity | `info` |
| `MYAPP_TIMEOUT` | Request timeout (ms) | `30000` |

## Troubleshooting

If you encounter authentication errors, try:
1. Clear your cached credentials: `rm ~/.config/myapp/token`
2. Re-authenticate: `myapp auth login`
3. Check your network connection
